*Blizzard breaks the kiss* (OOC:If it wasn't already broken)

Blizzard: Wan=
t to go somewhere after you get healed up?

*Blizzard asks Sinister*


*Twi=
ster looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns with a big sigh. She than st=
ands up walks closer to the Base with her head lowered*


*Infectra sighs*
=

Infectra: I hope that the wind isn't a tornado.

*Infectra closes her opti=
cs*

Infectra: Now where are heading? Which way?

*Infectra asks Airbomber =
while pointing her extended finger around*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 =
11:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Sinister kisses Blizzard. Sinesi=
s turns his head and stares at Twister.

  "Yeah, I guess your right." He s=
aid to her.

  "I guess we go wherever the wind takes us." Airbomber said.
=

  "I just hope that we can survive in a trio." Stranato said...
    ----- =
Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 8:43 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


    *Blizzard smiles*

    Blizzard: Maybe I can make it better...

  =
  *Blizzard moves closer to Sinister ready to lock a kiss with him*

    *T=
wister starts letting out a low growl. She didn't want to make Blizzard mad=
 and lose her as friend. She knows they will always be sisters but she want=
ed them to be friends but she was afraid that if Blizzard gets more involve=
d with Sinister than she might be forgoten about and left behind. She sits =
there and tries to ignore Blizzard's action and turns back to Sinesis*

   =
 Twister: I think you should get to a CR Chamber but thats only my suggesti=
on...

    *Twister says with her optics blinking quickly trying to ignore =
Blizzard and Sinister*




    *Infectra nods to Stranato and smiles when A=
irbomber wraps his arms around her*

    Infectra: Do we have anywhere to g=
o, anywhere?

    *Infectra asks Airbomber with sadness in her optics*
    =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 7:30 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


      Sinesis and Sinister both smile. Dracona frowns, nobody =
ever liked her, Plintissa even used her, but no more of that now, she was h=
er own agent. But what Dracona didn't want Sinesis and Sinister to know, is=
 that she had escaped from their programming and had been doing this stuff =
on her own. Dracona walked around the Radicons and up to Sinesis and Sinist=
er.

      "I'm fine, Blizzard, but I hurt right here." Sinister said, he t=
ouched his lips.

      "How can you be fine? That damn 3D and stuff almost=
 killed us! Personally, I ache all over!" Sinesis said.

      "Yeah, I kno=
w." Sinister said. He winked to Sinesis. Train Wreck turned to Dracona.

  =
    "I never felt so good, I feel like I can lock on a Rings of Saturn and =
break someones arm beyond repair!" Train Wreck said.

      "Good." Dracona=
 simply replied.

      Stranato and Airbomber look at each other, they wer=
e worried.

      "Watch your back, Infectra, remember my training tips." S=
tranato said. Airbomber wrapped his arms around Infectra, at all costs he w=
ould certainly give his life to protect her...
        ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
      Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 8:23 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


        *Infectra runs after Airbomber and Stranato*


        *Bli=
zzard and Twister stand there watching the three run away*

        Blizzar=
d: Yeah, we're with you.

        *Twister nods*

        *Blizzard walks u=
p to Sinister*

        Blizzard: Are you okay?

        *Twister walks up =
to Sinesis*

        Twister: Are your damages bad?
          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

          Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 7:45 PM
          Subject: Neo Be=
ast Wars


          Deemos and Inzola walk up to Lunarpine and Ramulus.

 =
         "Hello?" Deemos asked, he was getting mad.

          Gangon's spa=
rk is almost DEAD, his spark was trying to join with the Matrix.

         =
 Plintissa gets up and Airbomber jumps next to her. Dracona fires an ice be=
am. Airbomber jumps out of the way and his arm is frozen as he pushes Plint=
issa out of the way. Dracona laughs. But suddenly.

          Dracona: What=
 the?

          Dracona is grabbed and listed up, and gets the Dudley Deat=
h Drop from Stronghold and Blender. Blender does the Diamond Cutter sign.

=
          Blender: Bang!

          "Nothing like a good beating, as long a=
s your not the one recieving it." Stronghold said. Sinesis and Sinister fir=
ed beams that blasted Blender and Stronghold from behind. They suddenly had=
 trouble moving. Sinesis and Sinister stood up smiling.

          "Take a =
licking and keep on ticking!" Sinister said. The device they were holding w=
as a reprograming device. Stronghold and Blender stared mindlessly. Stranat=
o looked on in shock. Dracona stands up and slaps Blender. He wakes up. She=
 slaps Stronghold and wakes him up. Blender turns and Train Wreck is runnin=
g by. Blender trips him up! Train Wreck is kicked in the ribs by Dracona. S=
inesis and Sinister fired at him with the reprogramming beam. Train Wreck s=
tares, looking more evil than before. Arrow is grabbed and whipped by Stron=
ghold, right into Blender's clotheline. Sinesis and Sinister fire the beam =
and hit Arrow as well. Arrow suddenly turns on Airbomber, firing at him. Ai=
rbomber moves out of the way as a beam hits the spot. Suddenly, the device =
explodes and blows off Sinesis' arm. Plintissa is holding a smoking blaster=
. Plintissa and Artist run as Sinesis fires furiously with his other arm. P=
lintissa and Artist escape. Airbomber is helped up by Stranato.

          =
"Infectra, run!" Airbomber said. Stranato and Airbomber run, leaving their =
former Radicon teammates behind. Train Wreck, Sinesis, Sinister, Arrow, Str=
onghold, and Blender stand next to their leader, Dracona.

          "Our d=
evice was destroyed!" Sinister said.

          "No matter, we'll get those=
 5." Dracona said.

          Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.

        =
  "Blizzard, Twister, you with us?" Dracona asked.

          Stranato and =
Airbomber flee into the woods.

          Plintissa and Artist run over a h=
ill.

          Dracona contacts Zardus.

          "Zardus, this is anonym=
ous bot looking for a good side, are you interested in a good team of 9 bot=
s?" Dracona asks...
